articles.title: Pope: immigrants make societies grow
articles.description: Francis recalled the words of Bishop Geremia Bonomelli, who lived at the turn of the 19th and 20th centuries, who called Italy “a child who is constantly on the move”. “This is a reality that is especially close to me, because my family also emigrated to Argentina,” the Pope recalled. He emphasized that the mobility […]

articles.title: World Cup qualifiers: Lionel Messi set to play for Argentina against Uruguay after injury
articles.description: Argentina sit second in the single South American World Cup qualifying table, six points behind runaway leaders Brazil but nine points ahead of Uruguay
articles.content:
Argentina sit second in the single South American World Cup qualifying table, six points behind runaway leaders Brazil but nine points ahead of Uruguay

articles.title: Brazil flour millers ask president to intervene against GMO wheat from Argentina
articles.description: SAO PAULO, Nov 11 (Reuters) - Brazilian flour milling association Abitrigo said it would ask the president's office to convene a national biosecurity committee to review a decision allowing imports of GMO wheat flour from Argentina, according to a statement on Thursday.Abitrigo also said it is evaluating legal options to suspend a decision by Brazilian biosecurity agency

articles.title: Argentina's Bioceres won't immediately commercialize GM wheat - company source
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 11 (Reuters) - Argentine biotech company Bioceres will not immediately commercialize genetically modified wheat despite GMO flour having been approved on Thursday by main importer Brazil, according to a company source who asked not to be named.The company will seek approval from other key importers before going ahead with commercial sales of the drought
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 11 (Reuters) - Argentine biotech company Bioceres will not immediately commercialize genetically modified wheat despite GMO flour having been approved on Thursday by main importer Brazil, according to a company source who asked not ... [323 chars]

articles.title: Brazil clears sale of GMO wheat flour from Argentina
articles.description: Brazil on Thursday cleared imports of flour from Argentina made with wheat modified genetically to resist drought and a common herbicide, making it the first market in the world to grant such approval. Brazilian biosecurity agency CTNBio said the unanimous decision applied only to wheat flour.
articles.content:
Brazil on Thursday cleared imports of flour from Argentina made with wheat modified genetically to resist drought and a common herbicide, making it the first market in the world to grant such approval.

articles.title: Brazil clears sale of flour from Argentina's GMO wheat
articles.description: SAO PAULO, Nov 11 (Reuters) - Brazilian biosecurity agency CTNBio on Thursday approved a request to allow the sale in Brazil of flour from a wheat variety that has been genetically modified to resist drought and tolerate a widely applied herbicide, the world's first such approval.The move comes even as Brazilian flour millers threatened to stop buying wheat from Argentina,

articles.title: Rugby-Two changes for Argentina in team to play Italy
articles.description: Argentina have included Santiago Cordero on the wing and Juan Martin Gonzalez on the flank in two changes to their starting lineup to face Italy in the autumn international series clash in Treviso on Saturday.
articles.content: Argentina have included Santiago Cordero on the wing and Juan Martin Gonzalez on the flank in two changes to their starting lineup to face Italy in the autumn international series clash in Treviso on Saturday. Coach Mario Ledesma has resisted the tem... [1393 chars]
